About me

  • Hi there! My name is Xiu Huang. Welcome to my personal website and blog!

  • I am a fifth year PhD student majoring in Computational Biology and Bioinformatics at Yale University.

  • I am crazy about computer and biology. I think they each represent the top-notch products from manpower and mother natural.
